description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共青海省委书记，中共江西省委书记，全国人大内务司法委员会副主任委员，全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Party Secretary of Qinghai and Jiangxi, Vice Chairman of the Internal and Judicial Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress, and Vice Chairman of the Social and Legal Affairs Committee of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，强卫在担任北京市委政法委书记期间，曾主持会议下令终止侦查朱令铊中毒案。
description.en: It was reported that during his tenure as Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Political and Legal Affairs Commission, Qiang Wei presided over a meeting and ordered the termination of the investigation into the Zhu Ling thallium poisoning case.

description.zh-cn: 2013年3月，强卫接替苏荣担任中共江西省委书记，同年4月接任江西省人大常委会主任。
description.en: In March 2013, Qiang Wei succeeded Su Rong as Party Secretary of Jiangxi, and in April of the same year, he took over as Director of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2016年6月，鹿心社接替强卫担任中共江西省委书记，次年1月接任江西省人大常委会主任。
description.en: In June 2016, Lu Xinshe succeeded Qiang Wei as Party Secretary of Jiangxi, and in January of the following year, he took over as Director of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2007年3月，强卫接替赵乐际担任中共青海省委书记，同年6月接任青海省人大常委会主任。
description.en: In March 2007, Qiang Wei succeeded Zhao Leji as Party Secretary of Qinghai, and in June of the same year, he took over as Director of the Standing Committee of the Qinghai Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2013年3月，骆惠宁接替强卫担任中共青海省委书记，同月接任青海省人大常委会主任。
description.en: In March 2013, Luo Huining succeeded Qiang Wei as Party Secretary of Qinghai, and in the same month, he took over as Director of the Standing Committee of the Qinghai Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2005年12月，强卫接替阳安江担任中共北京市纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: In December 2005, Qiang Wei succeeded Yang Anjiang as Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 2006年11月，马志鹏接替强卫担任中共北京市纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: In November 2006, Ma Zhipeng succeeded Qiang Wei as Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 1996年3月，强卫接替汪统担任中共北京市委政法委员会书记。
description.en: In March 1996, Qiang Wei succeeded Wang Tong as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2002年5月，吉林接替强卫担任中共北京市委政法委员会书记。
description.en: In May 2002, Ji Lin succeeded Qiang Wei as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2004年4月，强卫接替吉林担任中共北京市委政法委员会书记。
description.en: In April 2004, Qiang Wei succeeded Ji Lin as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2007年3月，王安顺接替强卫担任中共北京市委政法委员会书记。
description.en: In March 2007, Wang Anshun succeeded Qiang Wei as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2001年3月，强卫接替龙新民担任中共北京市委专职副书记。
description.en: In March 2001, Qiang Wei succeeded Long Xinmin as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2007年3月，程世峨接替强卫担任中共北京市委专职副书记。
description.en: In March 2007, Cheng Shie succeeded Qiang Wei as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1994年3月，强卫接替李志坚担任中共北京市委宣传部部长。
description.en: In March 1994, Qiang Wei succeeded Li Zhijian as Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1996年3月，龙新民接替强卫担任中共北京市委宣传部部长。
description.en: In March 1996, Long Xinmin succeeded Qiang Wei as Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1999年3月，强卫接替张良基担任北京市公安局局长。
description.en: In March 1999, Qiang Wei succeeded Zhang Liangji as Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 2001年8月，马振川接替强卫担任北京市公安局局长。
description.en: In August 2001, Ma Zhenchuan succeeded Qiang Wei as Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.
